title: WISK: Bar Inventory Software Download
text: Running a bar or restaurant has never been easier with WISK.ai, your new bar assistant.WISK.ai is not just an inventory app. This intelligent bar and restaurant management software offers a variety of solutions for your business including beverage analytics, a recipe cost calculator, a liquor inventory app, ordering, receiving, and more.The bar inventory app is the simplest, yet most accurate inventory system out there for venues of all sizes that serve alcohol. You can even add as many users as you want to split up the work. Right now, 20-30% of your liquid assets are being spilled, over-poured, or stolen. With WISK.ai, you will be given the data you need to put that profit back into your pocket.This platform will enable you to:-Reduce alcohol inventory time by 80%-Identify losses-Minimize waste and dead stock-Keep track of inventory, sales, orders, and deliveries-Forecast sales using the weather, events, holidays, and more-Analyze sales analytics from previous years to create promotions-Accurately cost recipes for mixed drinks and cocktailsMost importantly, WISK.ai will help you decrease costs and improve sales and efficiency. Youll not only be able to keep track of your inventory, but youll be able to plan for future growth.Download your very own bar assistant now.
